title: Chunky And Ugly Sans Serif
content:
This is a chunky font...kind of ugly but I need an identification. Any information would help. Thanks!!!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317113834im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-10-03%20at%205_5698.22.29%20PM.png)

Font: 

 FORQUE 

Solved By:

author: bobmarley65

comments.content: It looks like **[Forque](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317113834/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-3%20%2F%20%28Freemium%29&ffam=FORQUE%20-%20Regular&fid=d5526cbef97d91401d9418097a466ef2&fstyle=i&fsize=60&text=TESTIMONIALS&wrap=2)** free font by Tup Wanders
